text.div:
ActCoverageTypeCode

Definition:
Set of codes indicating the type of insurance policy or program that pays for the cost of benefits provided to covered parties.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode where concept is-a _ActCoverageTypeCode

name: ActCoverageTypeCode
description:
Definition:
Set of codes indicating the type of insurance policy or program that pays for the cost of benefits provided to covered parties.
